title: comic book style "WFMU" logo
content:
the "wfmu" type used on those stickers

and if you can please recommend me some similar fonts  
i'm looking for something related to the robert crumb fonts used on his books or so  
thanks

comments.content:
ok thanks  
ive been there before  
but does anyone knows the exact name of this font in particular?

It looks like a font series that Havana Street Clip Art used to sell . . . You should contact them directly . . . You can see this font in use throughout their website . . .

[http://www.havanastreet.com/index.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015045042/http:/www.havanastreet.com/index.htm "http://www.havanastreet.com/index.htm")

Stuart :D

hmm i dunno, all i saw there was clip art instead of fonts (i know you said they used to sell) but, anyways :/  
if anyone knows something
